item.title: Issue #1591 created
item.description:
Implausible filter expressions

I propose to classify E[P] as an implausible expression if the only possible value of P that has an effective boolean value is the empty sequence.

An example might be $uris[parse-uri(.)]. The result of parse-uri is either a map or an empty sequence, so computing the EBV will give either false or an error.

Classifying an expression as implausible licenses the processor to reject it as a static error.
